dashboard.name: Control Room Grid
dashboard.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6
dashboard.rules: Dense packing. Widgets must stretch to fill height (h-full). No jagged bottoms.

marketing.name: Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetry. Use col-span-full for hero, col-span-4 for features. Leave negative space.

form.name: Single Column Focus
form.rules: Labels above inputs. Clear validation messages. Primary action full width on mobile.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 rounded-md transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-md transition-all

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: bg-muted/50 text-muted-foreground font-medium text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

images.description: Abstract blurry car driving, dark blue tones. Perfect for login page background.
Luxury car fleet in parking lot. Use for 'Fleet Status' widget or dashboard header.
Corporate team meeting. Use for 'About Us' or 'Team' section if needed.

steps.command: yarn add lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge date-fns recharts react-day-picker @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-switch @radix-ui/react-tabs @radix-ui/react-avatar @radix-ui/react-separator @radix-ui/react-tooltip @radix-ui/react-popover @radix-ui/react-accordion

steps.details: Add font imports. Define CSS variables for colors (primary, secondary, accent, etc.) in :root and .dark classes. Apply base styles for body and headings.
Build atomic components (Button, Input, Card, Badge) using the design tokens. Ensure they support dark mode and have proper focus states.
Create Sidebar/Navbar layout. Ensure responsive behavior (collapsible sidebar on mobile). Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard.
Implement pages in order: Auth -> Dashboard -> Vehicle List -> Reservation Flow. Use the 'Tetris' grid for marketing/landing pages if applicable.

universal_rules: DO NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specified in the 'gradients' section.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state and a focus ring.
Use 'data-testid' on all buttons, inputs, and links for testing.
Follow the 'Control Room' grid for data-heavy screens.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text.
Dark mode is mandatory. Test all components in both modes.
